item.title: Super SSH (picoCTF 3)
item.description: Challenge Author: Difficulty: Easy Description Using a secure shell (ssh) is going to be pretty important. Additional details will be available after launching your challenge instance. Process / Notes Will need to ssh into this one. ssh -p ’the port number’ username@destination enter the password It gave me the flag! 3 minutes 52 seconds to complete Hints None used Core Lessons Understanding how to SSH into a specific port with a specific username at a desired target is a core skill.
